page.title: 12SHOPPING IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: Here in Letham there are several shops where you can buy groceries,vegetables and meat.In the Post Office you can buy all of these and newspapers along with stamps and postal orders! In the Co-op your shopping will cost you the same as if you shopped in the Forfar Co-op. There is a baker's and a general store where as well as groceries, sweets and cigarettes you can buy toys or wellingtons and slippers. The only clothes shop is an expensive boutique.There are two electricians' but there is no pharmacy.Without transport, you send your prescription via the school dinner van to Forfar and collect it later from the Post Office. The local library is well stocked and is open three times a week.
